data.name: MegaLinkTitle
data.value: ลิงก์ MEGA:
data.comment: Text placed just before the link that will be shared or copied to clipboard. Try to preserve the MEGA uppercase word. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MegaShareLinkMessage
data.value: ฉันต้องการแชรไฟล์จาก MEGA คลาวด์กับคุณ
data.comment: Text used as title of the message to share a MEGA link.

data.name: InitTourAccess1
data.value: รับ
data.comment: Label 'get' for the first part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess2
data.value: การเข้ารหัสเต็มรูปแบบ
data.comment: Label 'fully encrypted access' for the second part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess3
data.value: ทุกที่ทุกเวลา
data.comment: Label 'anywhere, anytime.' for the third part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess_Title
data.value: เข้าถึง MEGA
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the easy access. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourPrivacy1
data.value: เก็บไฟล์ของคุณให้ปลอดภัยด้วย MEGA
data.comment: Label 'keep your files safe with MEGA's' for the first part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase less the word MEGA in uppercase.

data.name: InitTourPrivacy2
data.value: การเข้ารหัสตั้งแต่ต้นทางถึงปลายทาง
data.comment: Label 'end-to-end encryption.' for the second part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourPrivacy_Title
data.value: ความเป็นส่วนตัว MEGA
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the privacy. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourSpace1
data.value: ลงทะเบียนตอนนี้จะได้รับ
data.comment: Label 'register now and get' for the first part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpace2
data.value: ฟรีพื้นที่ 50 GB
data.comment: Label '50 GB of free space.' for the second part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string.

data.name: InitTourSpace_Title
data.value: พื้นที่ MEGA
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the space. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourSpeed1
data.value: ถ่ายโอนได้รวดเร็ว
data.comment: Label 'transfers are fast.' for the first part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpeed2
data.value: แชร์ไฟล์กับทุกคนได้สะดวกและรวดเร็ว
data.comment: Label 'quickly share files with everyone.' for the second part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpeed_Title
data.value: ความเร็ว MEGA
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the speed. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreditCardRecurringPayments

data.comment: Label to indicate the user that the Credit Card payments are recurring.

data.name: CVV
data.value: CVV
data.comment: Label for the 'CVV' text when register a credit card - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ExpiresOn
data.value: วันที่หมดอายุ
data.comment: Label for the 'Expires on' text into the my account page, indicating the expiration date of a PRO account without a valid subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: FirstName
data.value: ชื่อ
data.comment: Label for any 'First name' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Get2MonthsFree
data.value: รับฟรี 2 เดือนทันที ถ้าสมัครใช้งานบัญชีแบบ PRO 1 ปี
data.comment: Label to indicate the user that he obtains 2 free months with a one-year pro plan subscription.

data.name: LastName
data.value: นามสกุล
data.comment: Label for any 'Last name' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Month

data.name: Province

data.name: SelectedPlan
data.value: คุณได้เลือกแผน {0}
data.comment: Label to indicate the selected plan during the payment process. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name/type of the selected plan in runtime.

data.name: SelectMembership
data.value: เลือกการสมัครสมาชิก
data.comment: Label to indicate the user that is needed select a membership (monthly or annualy) for upgrade his account.

data.name: SettingsShort
data.value: ตั้งค่า
data.comment: Label abreviated for any 'Settings' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible - MAX 10 characteres).

data.name: State
data.value: มลรัฐ
data.comment: Label for any 'State' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: StorageShort

data.comment: Label abreviated for any 'Storage' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible - MAX 10 characteres).

data.name: Year

data.comment: Label for any 'Year' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: RenewsOn
data.value: ต่ออายุเมื่อ
data.comment: Label for the 'Renews on' text into the my account page, indicating the renewal date of a subscription - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AccountPurchased
data.value: คุณเคยสั่งซื้อแล้ว {0} บัญชี
data.comment: Label to indicate the purchased account/subscription. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name/type in runtime.

data.name: AccountRenewalNotice
data.value: เมื่อครบรอบ {0} การสมัครใช้งาน {0} ของคุณจะถูกสร้างโดยอัตโนมัติจนกว่าจะเข้าสู่ระบบและยกเลิกการสมัครใช้งานก่อนวันที่ต่ออายุจะมาถึง
data.comment: Label to indicate the renewal period of the purchased subscription. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the renewal period string (Monthly or Annually) in runtime.

data.name: Annual
data.value: ประจำปี
data.comment: Label for any 'Annual' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Awesome
data.value: ยอดเยี่ยมมาก
data.comment: Label for any 'Awesome' text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ChoosePaymentMethod
data.value: เลือกวิธีการชำระเงิน
data.comment: Label to indicate the user that is needed choose a payment method for upgrade his account.

data.name: NoPaymentMethodsAvailable
data.value: ขณะนี้ ยังไม่มีวิธีการชำระเงินที่พร้อมใช้งานสำหรับแผนนี้

data.name: UI_FromBasePrice
data.value: จาก {0:N} {1}/เดือน
data.comment: Label for indicate the base price of a product or plan, for example "From 9,99 €/month" - (String as short as possible). Keep the code {0:N} because is for include price of the product in runtime. Keep the code {1} because is for include currency in runtime.

data.name: UI_Free

data.name: UI_LinkWithoutKey
data.value: ลิงก์ไม่รวมคีย์
data.comment: Label for any 'Link without key' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ProOnly
data.value: (PRO เท่านั้น)
data.comment: Label to indicate that a feature is only available for PRO users. Keep between parentheses and capital letters - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_SetExpirationDate
data.value: กำหนดวันหมดอายุ
data.comment: Label for any 'Set expiry date' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateCanceled
data.value: ยกเลิกแล้ว
data.comment: Label for the state of a canceled transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateCompleting
data.value: กำลังเสร็จสิ้น...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being completing - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateDownloaded
data.value: ดาวน์โหลดเสร็จแล้ว
data.comment: Label for the state of a download transfer when is finished - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateDownloading
data.value: กำลังดาวน์โหลด...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being downloading - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateError
data.value: มีข้อผิดพลาดในการถ่ายโอน
data.comment: Label for the state of a failed transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateNotStarted
data.value: พร้อมแล้ว
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is ready but not started for some reason - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStatePaused
data.value: พักแล้ว
data.comment: Label for the state of a paused transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStatePreparing
data.value: กำลังจัดเตรียม...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being preparing - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateQueued
data.value: อยู่ในคิว
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is queued - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateRetrying
data.value: กำลังลองอีกครั้ง...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being retrying - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateUploaded
data.value: วันที่อัปโหลด
data.comment: Label for the state of an upload transfer when is finished - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateUploading
data.value: กำลังอัปโหลด...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being uploading - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CancelDownloads
data.value: ยกเลิกดาวน์โหลด
data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel downloads' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CancelUploads
data.value: ยกเลิกอัปโหลด
data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel uploads' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Completed
data.value: เรียบร้อยแล้ว
data.comment: Label for any 'Completed' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_NoCompletedTransfers
data.value: ไม่มีรายการถ่ายโอน
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty completed transfers page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_AgreeTermsOfService
data.value: ฉันเห็นด้วยกับเงื่อนไขการให้บริการ
data.comment: Text placed just after a checkbox to indicate that user is agree with the 'Terms of Service' into the 'create account' page.

data.name: UI_ConfirmPassword
data.value: ยืนยันรหัสผ่าน
data.comment: Label for any 'Confirm password' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Email
data.value: อีเมล
data.comment: Label for any 'Email' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_FirstName
data.value: ชื่อ
data.comment: Label for any 'First name' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Password
data.value: รหัสผ่าน
data.comment: Label for any 'Password' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ConfirmPinLock
data.value: ยืนยันการล็อก PIN
data.comment: Label for any 'Confirm PIN lock' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). Preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: UI_PinLock
data.value: ล็อก PIN
data.comment: Label for any 'PIN Lock' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: UI_MEGA_SDK_Version
data.value: เวอร์ชัน MEGA SDK
data.comment: Label for any 'MEGA SDK version' button, link, text, title, etc. Preserve the "MEGA SDK" in uppercase - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_NewPinLock
data.value: ล็อก PIN ใหม่
data.comment: Label for any 'New PIN lock' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). Preserve the PIN uppercase word.

data.name: UI_NewPassword
data.value: รหัสผ่านใหม่
data.comment: Label for any 'New password' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LastName
data.value: นามสกุล
data.comment: Label for any 'Last name' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ViewTermsOfService
data.value: ดูเงื่อนไขการให้บริการที่นี่
data.comment: Text used as a link to view the 'Terms of Service' into the 'create account' page.

data.name: UI_DataProtectionRegulation
data.value: หลักคุ้มครองข้อมูลส่วนบุคคล
data.comment: Label for any 'Data Protection Regulation' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LegalAndPolicies
data.value: กฎหมายและนโยบาย
data.comment: Label for the title of the "Legal and Policies" section which include links to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Copyright
data.value: ลิขสิทธิ์
data.comment: Label for any 'Copyright' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LearnMore
data.value: เรียนรู้เพิ่มเติม
data.comment: Label for any 'Learn more' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TakedownGuidance
data.value: คำแนะนำการแจ้งลบเนื้อหา
data.comment: Label for any 'Takedown Guidance' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_OpenBrowser
data.value: เปิดเบราว์เซอร์
data.comment: Label for the button to allow the user open the default browser - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Retry
data.value: ลองใหม่
data.comment: Label for any 'Retry' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CloseOtherSessions
data.value: ปิดเซสชั่นอื่นๆ
data.comment: Label for any 'Close other sessions' button, link, etc., to close all other active sessions except the current one - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_DoNotShowMeAgain
data.value: ไม่ต้องแสดงในครั้งต่อไป
data.comment: Label for a check box included into a dialog to indicate don't show it again.

data.name: UI_BackupRecoveryKey
data.value: สำรองคีย์การกู้คืน
data.comment: Label for any 'Backup Recovery Key' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Max. length 20 characters.

data.name: UI_Close
data.value: ปิด
data.comment: Label for any 'Close' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TestPassword
data.value: ทดสอบรหัสผ่าน
data.comment: Label for any 'Test Password' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_PlainText
data.value: ข้อความธรรมดา
data.comment: Label for any 'Plain text' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_EnablePinLock
data.value: เปิดใช้งานรหัส PIN
data.comment: Label for the switch button to enable or disable the PIN lock code. Keep PIN uppercase - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_RecoveryKeyDescription
data.value: คีย์การกู้คืนของคุณช่วยให้คุณสามารถเข้าสู่ระบบบัญชีของคุณแม้ว่าคุณจะลืมรหัสผ่านก็ตาม ขอให้เก็บไว้ในที่ปลอดภัย
data.comment: Label to describe the 'Recovery Key' and its purpose.

data.name: UI_SessionManagement
data.value: การจัดการเซสชัน
data.comment: Label for the "Settings" option to manage sessions - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_SessionManagementDescription
data.value: การดำเนินการนี้จะนำคุณออกจากเซสชันที่มีการใช้งานอื่น ๆ ทั้งหมดยกเว้นในปัจจุบัน คุณจะต้องลงชื่อเข้าใช้อีกครั้งกับอุปกรณ์อื่น ๆ ของคุณเพื่อใช้ MEGA ต่อไป
data.comment: Label to describe the "Session Management" option of the "Settings" section.

data.name: UI_Warning
data.value: คำเตือน
data.comment: Label for any 'Warning' title, message, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_EnableTwoFactorAuth
data.value: เปิดใช้งานการรับรองความถูกต้องด้วยสองปัจจัย
data.comment: Label for the "toggle" or "switch" button to enable/disable the Two-Factor Authentication.

data.name: UI_TwoFactorAuth
data.value: การรับรองความถูกต้องด้วยสองปัจจัย (2FA)
data.comment: Label for the 'Two-Factor Authentication' section of the security settings.

data.name: UI_TwoFactorAuthSettingsDescription
data.value: การรับรองความถูกต้องด้วยสองปัจจัย คือการรักษาความปลอดภัยชั้นที่สองสำหรับบัญชีของคุณ
data.comment: Description for the 'Two-Factor Authentication' in the security settings section.

data.name: UI_Setup2FA
data.value: ตั้งค่าการรับรองความถูกต้องด้วยสองปัจจัย
data.comment: Label for any 'Setup Two-Factor Authentication' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_SixDigitCode
data.value: รหัส 6 หลัก
data.comment: Placeholder text of the field to type the 6-digit code provided for the authenticator app to verify the Multi-Factor Authentication.

data.name: UI_Verify
data.value: ตรวจสอบ
data.comment: Label for any 'Verify' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CopySeed
data.value: คัดลอกรหัส
data.comment: Label of the button to copy the seed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LostAuthDeviceQuestion
data.value: อุปกรณ์ตัวรับรองความถูกต้องของคุณสูญหายหรือไม่
data.comment: Label for any link/button to help the user in case lost the authentication device for MFA - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ChangePasswordDescription
data.value: กรอกและยืนยันรหัสผ่านใหม่ของคุณและคลิกบันทึก
data.comment: Text to describe the change password process.

data.name: UI_Export
data.value: ส่งออก
data.comment: Label for any 'Export' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Restore
data.value: กู้คืน
data.comment: Label for any 'Restore' button, link, text, title, etc. For example for restore files from the rubbish bin - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_UsedCache
data.value: ใช้แคช
data.comment: Label to indicate the amount of used cache - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_OpenIn
data.value: เปิดด้วย...
data.comment: Label for any 'Open in...' button, link, text, title, etc. to open a file or other kind of resource with a certain app - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_MFA_SetupStep1
data.value: สแกนหรือคัดลอกรหัสไปยังแอปตัวรับรองความถูกต้องของคุณ อย่าลืมสำรองรหัสนี้ไว้ในที่ปลอดภัยในกรณีที่คุณทำอุปกรณ์หาย
data.comment: Label for the step 1 to setup the Multi-Factor Authentication.

data.name: UI_MFA_SetupStep2
data.value: หลังจากตั้งค่ารหัสในแอปตัวรับรองความถูกต้องของคุณแล้ว ให้กรอกรหัส 6 หลักตามที่ปรากฎ
data.comment: Label for the step 2 to setup the Muti-Factor Authentication.

data.name: UI_FindApp
data.value: ค้นหาแอป
data.comment: Label for any 'Find app' button, link, text, title, etc, to find an app to open a file, resource, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ClearRubbishBin
data.value: ล้างถังขยะ
data.comment: Label for a 'Clear Rubbish Bin' button to clear the rubbish bin content - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ResumeSession
data.value: กลับมาทำงานต่อ
data.comment: Label for any 'Resume session' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).
